settings.code:
<script>
  ;(()=>{
    /******************
    COLORS
    */
  
    const styles_id = 'bricks-frontend-inline-inline-css';
  	const swatches = document.querySelectorAll('.color-guide__swatch');
    
    /* Functions */
    const rgb2hex = c => '#'+ c.match(/\d+/g).map(x=>(+x).toString(16).padStart(2,0)).join``;
    
    /* END Functions */
    
    swatches.forEach(e => {
    	const sample = e.querySelector('.color-guide__swatch-sample'); 
      const hex_label =  e.querySelector('.color-guide__swatch-label-hex');
      const var_label =  e.querySelector('.color-guide__swatch-label-val');
      const rgb = getComputedStyle(sample).backgroundColor;
      
      /* Set vraiable name label */
      const sample_id = sample.id;
      [...document.styleSheets].map( obj => {
        if(obj.ownerNode.id === styles_id){
          [...obj.cssRules].map( rule => {
            if(rule.selectorText === `#` + sample_id){
              var_label.innerText = rule.style.backgroundColor;
            }      	
          });
        }
      });
      
      /* Set HEX label */
      hex_label.innerText = rgb2hex(rgb);      
      
    } );
  })();
  
  ;(()=>{
  	/******************
    Fonts
    */
    const itemSelector = '.typography-guide__item';
    const sampleSelector = '.typography-guide__item-sample';
    const familySelector = '.typography-guide__item-font-family';
    const weightSelector = '.typography-guide__item-font-weight';
    const styleSelector = '.typography-guide__item-font-style';
    
    const items = [...document.querySelectorAll(itemSelector)];
    
    items.forEach( e => {
    	const sample = e.querySelector(sampleSelector);
      const style = getComputedStyle(sample);
      e.querySelector(familySelector).innerText = style.getPropertyValue("font-family");
       e.querySelector(weightSelector).innerText = style.getPropertyValue("font-weight");
      e.querySelector(styleSelector).innerText = style.getPropertyValue("font-style");
     console.log(style);
    });
  
  
  })();
</script>

settings.text: Set all Typography in the active Bricks Builder Theme. All fonts are Google Fonts served locally unless otherwise specified.
Accent Text - Set in Bricks Class System
Set all colors in Advanced Themer "Color Pallets"

Primary Colour should be the most dominant / Brand color

Below are 6 light and 6 dark variations

Accent should be the least used color.

Below are 6 light and 6 dark variations

Secondary Colour should be the next most dominant if the style calls for it.

Below are 6 light and 6 dark variations

Action is use if the Primary is not A11Y suitable. It should be a variation of Primary

Below are 6 light and 6 dark variations

Shade is a neutral color.

Below are 6 light and 6 dark variations
